class {{ class_def.classname }}(Base):
    __attrs__ = {{ class_def.attrs }}
    __keys__ = {{ class_def.keys }}

    def __init__(self{{ class_def.kwargs_text }}):
        {% if class_def.attrs|length == 0 -%}
        pass
        {% else -%}
        {% for attr in class_def.attrs -%}
        self.{{ attr }} = {{ attr }}
        {% endfor -%}
        {% endif -%}
        self._collection = list()
